t = int(raw_input())

while(t>0):
    
    n = int(raw_input())
    arr = []
    arr = map(int,raw_input().split())
    arr.sort()
  
    di = {}
    flag = 0
    
    for num in arr:
        for key in di:
            if(num == key):
                di[num]+=1
                flag = 1
                break
        if(flag == 1):
            flag = 0
        elif(flag == 0):
            di[num] = 1
    
    dic = sorted(di.keys())
    
    max_value = 0        
    for key in dic:
        if(di[key]>max_value):
            max_value = di[key]
            value = key
    
    print '%d %d' % (value,max_value)
       
             
    t-=1
